original_title: Home Lands Group to present first-ever Sri Lanka Property Investment Forum in Australia
original_body_lines: Home Lands Group of Companies, is set to make history by becoming the first Sri Lankan developer to conduct a Property Investment Forum in Australia to create interest in residential investment options in Sri Lanka.

The forum, to be held at Springvale City Hall in Melbourne on 25th October 2024, is an invitees-only event expected to attract over 450 high-end investors. Home Lands Group will showcase real estate investment concepts to the Sri Lankan community in Australia and Australian real estate investors without Sri Lankan origins. This investment portfolio will cater to long term and short-term investments and will provide a wide variety of options available at Home Lands Group. These include beach resort investment options that are geared to harness the increasing growth in tourist arrivals to the island, CBD real-estate investment, retirement villa options for time sharing, cost-effective and pampered lifestyle for residents, as well as luxury golf compound investment, for leisure and sport.

Home Lands Group Chairman Nalin Herath stated, “We are very proud to be the first Sri Lankan real estate company to go global at this scale, showcasing Sri Lanka’s real estate investment potential to the world. I am proud to say that Home Lands Group is Sri Lanka’s first multinational real estate company. This property investment forum was carried out to meet the high demand Home Lands real estate investment portfolio has gained during the past year.”
Home Lands Group expanded its real estate operations to Australia earlier this year by establishing Home Lands (Melbourne).
